https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lr3za9i5SpqTVA2W2uyx0DekgID.jpg Desperate to find employment, Karam picks up a job as ‘Pooja’ at a call center for sex chats, keeping most people in his life in the dark about the nature of his work. How long can he keep it up before everyone including his girlfriend and father find out? Dream Girl
